problem.markdown:
>> __________ is the rate at which energy is supplied.<<
( ) Efficiency ( ) Conservation ( ) Kinetic (x) Power ( ) Thermodynamics
[explanation] Power = Energy / Time and is the measure of the rate at which energy is supplied. [explanation]
problem.p: __________ is the rate at which energy is supplied.

choicegroup.label: __________ is the rate at which energy is supplied.

div.p: Power = Energy / Time and is the measure of the rate at which energy is supplied.
